Li Yang: the owner of a massage parlor that later became Orchids of Asia, took a selfie with President Donald Trump at his annual Super Bowl party.
Li Yang sold the business to a new owner: 3. Photographs of President Trump and his family posing with Li Yang circulated on social media, linking the Trumps to the sting operation in Florida.
Robert Kraft: the owner of the New England Patriots and a friend of Trump, was accused of soliciting prostitution at the Orchids of Asia massage parlor.
